did.abstract: Materials pertaining to contract negotiations between Pan American World Airways and pilots and flight engineers, including salary and other data. Pertains to PanAm, Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA), and the Flight Engineers international Association, 1960.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials pertaining to contract negotiations between Pan American World Airways and pilots and flight engineers, including salary and other data. Pertains to PanAm, Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA), and the Flight Engineers international Association, 1960.
